title: Opening Weekend Takeaways: Johnson, MacMahon, and Lopez
description:
Zach talks Suns-Lakers with Eddie Johnson, Clippers-Mavs with ESPN's Tim MacMahon, and Knicks-Hawks with ESPN's Andrew Lopez.
